name: Dude Simulator 4
description:
Dude Simulator 4 – a first-person open-world sandbox game with a plot. Some new adventures are awaiting the dude. The main character of the game gets to know that he has a brother living in a different city, so he sets out to find him. One night, on a country highway, he drives into a tree lying right on the road and crashes his car, with only a forest around him. When he wakes up in the morning, he finds himself locked up in a house and realizes that he was kidnapped by a maniac. However, escaping from the maniac’s trap is only the beginning of the dude’s adventures.
Along with the plot, the player can also explore the surroundings, find and spend money, go for a drive, enter any buildings, buy things, play jokes on other people, and so on – just anything you might want to do in real life.
